abstract: A federal judge has refused to approve a settlement between the Securities and Exchange Commission and Bank of America related to the acquisition of Merrill Lynch.
snippet: A federal judge has refused to approve a settlement between the Securities and Exchange Commission and Bank of America related to the acquisition of Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge has refused to approve a settlement between the Securities and Exchange Commission and Bank of America related to the acquisition of Merrill Lynch, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Judge Halts S.E.C. Settlement With BofA on Merrill
